page.title: 04A young citizen's thoughts
page.content: If you walk along{Bolton Road}you have Bolton road all around you. There are lots of{pubs}on Bolton road. I counted ten when I went along it. I don't know why we have so many pubs. It must be because{Pendlebury}is on the main road between{Manchester}and {Bolton}and if people get thirsty they can stop for a drink on the way. Some of the shops are a bit old fashioned but you can buy most things from them. The best one is the bike shop. I've got a{BMX}and if I need any spare parts I can get them from there.{I'm {glad I don't live in the countryside because you have to go miles to get to the shops. The only trouble with the shops in Pendlebury is for the{old {people}who live in old people's flats and they are a long way from the shops.{If I were the Mayor I'd give {them shops close to where they live.
